    "%matplotlib inline\n",
    "import pandas as pd\n",
    "import numpy as np\n",
    "import matplotlib.pyplot as plt"
   ]
  },

     "data": {
      "text/plain": [
       "Text(0.5, 1.0, 'Blue = SDSS, Green = HSC')"

   ],
   "source": [
    "#putting the path of the lens catalog\n",
    "len_path = '/home/idies/workspace/Storage/divyar/IAGRG_2022/DataStore/redmapper.dat'\n",
    "lenses = pd.read_csv(len_path, delim_whitespace=1)\n",
    "\n",
    "#printing the columns in the file\n",
    "print(lenses.keys())\n",
    "\n",
    "plt.plot(lenses['ra'], lenses['dec'], '.', ms=1.0)\n",
    "\n",
    "from glob import glob\n",
    "# we have given you many many files for sources, below code will capture a list of path for the files\n",
    "# It looks for the file ending '.dat'\n",
    "sflist = glob('/home/idies/workspace/Storage/divyar/IAGRG_2022/DataStore/hsc/*.dat')\n",
    "\n",
    "for fil in sflist:\n",
    "    src = pd.read_csv(fil, delim_whitespace=1)\n",
    "    plt.plot(src['ragal'], src['decgal'], 'g.', ms=1.0)\n",
    "plt.xlabel('RA  (deg)')\n",
    "plt.ylabel('DEC (deg)')\n",
    "plt.title('Blue = SDSS, Green = HSC')"
   ]
  },

  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 13,
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [
    {
     "name": "stdout",
     "output_type": "stream",
     "text": [
      "no of bins in first selection cut : 3642\n"
     ]
    },
    {
     "data": {
      "image/png": "\n",
      "text/plain": [
       "<Figure size 432x288 with 1 Axes>"
      ]
     },
     "metadata": {
      "needs_background": "light"
     },
     "output_type": "display_data"
    }
   ],
   "source": [
    "#visualizing the individual selection cuts\n",
    "\n",
    "plt.plot(lenses['zred'], lenses['lambda'], '.', ms=1.0)\n",
    "plt.plot(np.linspace(0.1,0.33,10),20*np.ones(10) , 'r-')\n",
    "plt.plot(np.linspace(0.1,0.33,10),30*np.ones(10) , 'r-')\n",
    "plt.plot(np.linspace(0.1,0.33,10),40*np.ones(10) , 'r-')\n",
    "plt.plot(np.linspace(0.1,0.33,10),55*np.ones(10) , 'r-')\n",
    "plt.plot(np.linspace(0.1,0.33,10),100*np.ones(10), 'r-')\n",
    "\n",
    "plt.plot(0.1*np.ones(10), np.linspace(20,100,10) ,  'r-')\n",
    "plt.plot(0.33*np.ones(10), np.linspace(20,100,10) , 'r-')\n",
    "\n",
    "plt.xlabel(r'$z_{\\rm red}$')\n",
    "plt.ylabel(r'$\\lambda$')\n",
    "plt.ylim(15,150)\n",
    "plt.yscale('log')\n",
    "\n",
    "#printing the number of lenses in a selection cut\n",
    "idx = (lenses['zred']>0.1) & (lenses['zred']<0.33) & (lenses['lambda']>25) & (lenses['lambda']<40)\n",
    "print('no of bins in first selection cut : %d'%np.sum(idx))"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 14,
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [],
   "source": [
    "from astropy.cosmology import FlatLambdaCDM"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 15,
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [
    {
     "data": {
      "text/plain": [
       "Text(0, 0.5, '$d_{\\\\rm com} {\\\\rm [h^{-1}Mpc]}$')"
      ]
     },
     "execution_count": 15,
     "metadata": {},
     "output_type": "execute_result"
    },
    {
     "data": {
      "image/png": "\n",
      "text/plain": [
       "<Figure size 432x288 with 1 Axes>"
      ]
     },
     "metadata": {
      "needs_background": "light"
     },
     "output_type": "display_data"
    }
   ],
   "source": [
    "cc = FlatLambdaCDM(H0=100, Om0=0.315) # H0=100 so that we can get distance in units of Mpc h-1\n",
    "zred = np.linspace(0,1,20)\n",
    "\n",
    "plt.plot(zred, cc.comoving_distance(zred))\n",
    "plt.xlabel(r'$z_{\\rm red}$')\n",
    "plt.ylabel(r'$d_{\\rm com} {\\rm [h^{-1}Mpc]}$')"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 16,
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [
